name: OK Tap
description:
OK Tap is a great time-waster game with a cute and colorful design. The simple tap to jump controls make it easy to play but hard to master.

The goal is to time your taps or your character will shrink until there is nothing left of him :(
But do a few good taps in a row and he will blow back up to his natural shape and form.

With 70 fun looking characters and daily rewards this game will stick on your phone for a long time.
